Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Enums

  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Color
    Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
    GameStatus
    GameStatus contains all the possible status the server can have during the gameplay.
    GameType
    GameType Enum Class contains definitions to be used by the game to know if it's in Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode.
    LeaderCardAction
    Four Leader Card actions, byte based
    Level
    Level enum-type Class contains all possible levels a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
    Marble
    Marble colours, used in Market and LeaderCards
    PlayerStatus
    PlayerStatus enum-type Class contains all possible statuses a player could have while playing the game.
    PopeSpace
    Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
    PopeTile
    Pope tile enum-type Class contains all possible positions for that a PopeTile can have as per Game rules.
    ResourceType
    ResourceType Enum Class contains all possible types of resources of the game.
    SoloActionToken
    Different Action Tokens for the SinglePlayer game
    VaticanReportSectionEnum
    Color enum-type Class contains all possible colors a Development Card (or Development Card Deck) can have.
